description: Read and write specific preferences under the `browser.messaging-system.personalized-cfr.*` namespace

functions.name: getAboutPreferencesNonDefaultValueCount
functions.description: Get number of prefs changed (specifically those in about:preferences)

functions.name: getFxAConfigured
functions.description: Get whether or not Firefox accounts are configured

functions.name: getLoginsSavedInBrowserCount
functions.description: Get count of logins saved in the browser

functions.name: getUpdateChannel
functions.description: Get the current Firefox update channel
